actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to allow concurrent payment of benefits under the Survivor Benefit Plan for the uniformed services and under the Veterans' Administration dependency and indemnity compensation program without a reduction in the amount of either benefit.

summary.text: Amends the Survivor Benefit Plan for the uniformed services to permit concurrent payment of benefits under this plan and under the Veterans' Administration dependency and indemnity compensation program without a reduction in the amount of either benefit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to allow concurrent payment of benefits under the Survivor Benefit Plan for the uniformed services and under the Veterans' Administration dependency and indemnity compensation program without a reduction in the amount of either benefit.
